main_product_type.value: Cloud-based investigation and digital evidence management platform (Scout / iDEMS) for justice, public safety, and national security organizations, designed to run in the customer’s AWS environment.

pricing_information.value: No pricing page found; mentions “No per-user pricing” and “pay-as-you-go pricing”.

industries.value: Justice and national security, public safety, DoD and intelligence, federal justice and homeland security, state and local government, corrections, fire investigations, legal e-discovery, campus and education

key_features.value: Ingests video, audio, images, documents, metadata; supports mobile extractions, laptop extractions, external hard drives, CCTV/IP/pole cams, drones, LiDAR crime scene scans, social media, prison calls; upload 1000+ files at a time; receive files from citizens via public portal; integrates with local and SharePoint folders; integrity validation (256-bit hashing); metadata extraction (EXIF, timestamps); file and codec standardization (auto convert to MP4/H.264; 57 combinations); computer vision (video synopsis, image analytics, auto-tagging); natural-language search; transcription (35+ languages); file and case sharing.

used_by.value: Law enforcement agencies, federal/state/local government investigative teams, DoD and intelligence community users (referenced as target users and verticals).

Press_releases.value: Company News posts include partnership announcements with Simple Technology Solutions, Kaseware, Mark43, Command Sourcing, Tyler Technologies, Medex Forensics.

conferences_attendance.value: State of GovTech, IACP Annual Conference, AWS re:Invent, National Narcotics Officer Assoc, Texas Police Chiefs Assoc. (TPCA), AWS Public Sector Summit

notes: Platform called 'Scout' - intelligent Digital Evidence Management System (iDEMS). Handles video, audio, images, documents, metadata from mobile extractions, laptop extractions, external hard drives, CCTV/IP/pole cameras, drones, LiDAR crime scene scans, social media, prison calls. Features: powerful natural-language search, video synopsis, image analytics, auto-transcription in 35+ languages, mugshot & gang database, camera registry & tip portal, file & case sharing. No per-user pricing. Delivers 10x+ ROIs. True Data Sovereignty - runs on customer's own account.

pricing_information.value: Three service models: Self Starter (Done by you - unlimited AI platform use), Sales Accelerator (Done with you - AI platform + team training + regular analysis), Fully Managed (Done for you - full process from qualifying to contacting). Personalized quotes. Multi-year discounts available.
